itunes:title: Faith in Practice Week 1 with John Mark Comer
title: Faith in Practice Week 1 with John Mark Comer
description:
For the first episode of the new year and the start of our Faith in Practice series, Raechel and Amanda talk with pastor, author, and hurry-eliminator John Mark Comer. On the heels of an unexpected 2020, and with the hope of a brand new year ahead, they explore what it really means to live like Jesus. How do we create everyday rhythms that bring fulfillment instead of emptiness and exhaustion? Touching on topics from marathon training and New Years de-resolutions to prayer and peppermint mochas, their conversation keeps coming back to one key question: what would Jesus do if He were me?

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 1 of the She Reads Truth Faith in Practice reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com.

Shop the Faith in Practice: A Biblical Study of Spiritual Disciplines reading plan collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/faith-in-practice-week-1-with-john-mark-comer/
